data.system_settings: MacBook Air (13", early 2014) macOS High Sierra 10.13.6
data.actual_result: The user with the RTL name is not in mutual friends
data.expected_result: The user with the long RTL name should be in mutual friends
data.short_description: Users with long RTL names, such as "﷽" repeated, don't show in mutual friends.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find/get a user with the name "﷽" repeated maximum times - Get 2 accounts to friend this user (so they'd be on the mutual friends list) - Look at the other accounts mutual friends
